main event: A civilian observed a wide rectangular object, yellowish white in color, in Red Hook, New York on 14 Feb 67, which was identified as the planet Venus.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately 45 minutes,The object had more intense lights at each end, One red light was pulsating near the center of the object, The object appeared stationary while the observer was in motion, The sighting occurred on a clear night with stars shining.
witness description: Civilian, exceptionally reliable witness, and a member of the International Brotherhood of Electrical Workers.
